tool_description: Extracts and normalizes financial statement data from company filings, converting raw financial information into standardized metrics for valuation analysis.

company_identifier.description: Company ticker symbol, CIK number, or company name

statement_types.description: Types of financial statements to parse

error_messages: Company not found: Verify the company identifier is correct and the company has public filings available.
Fiscal year data unavailable: The requested fiscal year data is not available for this company.
Data parsing error: Unable to extract financial data due to non-standard filing format.
usage: Provide company_identifier, statement_types array, and fiscal_years array. The tool returns normalized financial data across the specified periods for valuation analysis.

company_name.description: Full legal name of the company

fiscal_year_data.description: Financial metrics organized by fiscal year
